name: Annual Review & Planning Notion Template
description: Reflect on the last 12 months progression, reset and optimise the present then plan out your next 12 months, with ease.This template is a step-by-step guide broken down into 3 main sections:Review: Reflect on YearMy 3 Words (or Word of the Year)Scorecard Review (Includes scorecard database)What Went WellWhat Didn't Go WellWhat Went Off-CourseReset: Optimize the PresentDigital DetoxSkill BuildingNotion Strategy & Systems UpdateRenew: Next 12 MonthVision Board (with prompts)Goal SettingProject
features: Review: Reflect on YearMy 3 Words (or Word of the Year)Scorecard Review (Includes scorecard database)What Went WellWhat Didn't Go WellWhat Went Off-Course; My 3 Words (or Word of the Year); Scorecard Review (Includes scorecard database); What Went Well; What Didn't Go Well; What Went Off-Course; Reset: Optimize the PresentDigital DetoxSkill BuildingNotion Strategy & Systems Update; Digital Detox; Skill Building; Notion Strategy & Systems Update
